td.content: s:patient presents with Body Aches of 6 weeks duration. she is a 67 yr old female retired. she is a chronic alcoholic she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 157 cm, Weight 50.1 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17 a:Joint Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:pt presents with Body Aches. she is a 67 YO female. o:Height 157 cm, Weight 50 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 17 a:Joint Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed methotrexate - 2.5 mg every 12 hours for 3 doses per week, and ordered arthroscopy - knee.

s:a female aged 68 yrs presents with Body Aches for more than 5 days. o:Height 157 cm, Weight 50.6 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Joint Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed methotrexate - 7.5 mg weekly, and ordered CT Scan hip.
Do not IV Fluid and Support
